suite.name: Parallel Smart Contract Security Tests Using Consensys Mythril And Napalm Tools

test.name: TEST : Get verified smart contracts for address 0x29844D24b3Fb73bED90Db8922d411f5a063AC7D5 and log the contract information from the polygonscan.com Mainnet blockchain explorer. Then run the Consensys Napalm static analysis tool to check for Solidity vulnerabilities.

kw.name: Get File
kw.msg: ${NAPALM_OUTPUT} = ==================================== Now running...'napalm run detect' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== Now running....

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: ==================================== Now running...'napalm run detect' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== Now running...'napalm run direct' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 4 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== Now running...'napalm run inform' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ====================================
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` contains ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Get File
kw.msg: ${NAPALM_OUTPUT} = ==================================== Now running...'napalm run detect' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== Now running....
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: ==================================== Now running...'napalm run detect' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== Now running...'napalm run direct' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 4 rules Found 1 issues: Warning : It's necessary to implement proper controls on wallet security when privileged functions are used to protect sensitive functions. Location: /tmp/downloaded-contracts-in-docker/ethereum-contract1.sol#61-64 | function renounceOwnership() public onlyOwner { | emit OwnershipTransferred(owner, address(0)); | owner = address(0); | } ==================================== Now running...'napalm run inform' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ====================================
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Contain
kw.msg: '==================================== Now running...'napalm run detect' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== Now running...'napalm run direct' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 4 rules Found 1 issues: Warning : It's necessary to implement proper controls on wallet security when privileged functions are used to protect sensitive functions. Location: /tmp/downloaded-contracts-in-docker/ethereum-contract1.sol#61-64 | function renounceOwnership() public onlyOwner { | emit OwnershipTransferred(owner, address(0)); | owner = address(0); | } ==================================== Now running...'napalm run inform' Ran 1 tools Ran analysis using: Semgrep OSS, with 3 rules No issues found 0 ==================================== ' contains 'Warning'
